title: Argent Bank
description: 'ARGENT BANK', a new online bank striving to make a mark in the banking industry, my main role is to work closely with the project manager to set up the user dashboard. Even though Argent Bank is a newcomer, it has high aspirations, and the CTO has clearly emphasized the importance of this initiative. The project is divided into two phases: the first one deals with user authentication and the development of a functional dashboard, while the second phase will focus on managing user transactions.

title: Dimension
description: 'DIMENSION' is a music application that helps users stay motivated and focused while working, exercising, or meditating. Built with React, Dimension provides a seamless and intuitive user experience, featuring a clean and simple design that's easy to navigate. It's user-friendly, allowing you to customize your music by selecting various tracks and adjusting the volume. It works across multiple devices and platforms.

title: Kasa
description: 'KASA' a leading apartment rental platform in France, I had a key mission: to completely revamp their website. After a decade, their ASP.NET-based site needed modernization. Laura, the CTO, was transitioning to a full JavaScript stack with NodeJS for the back-end and React for the front-end. My primary task was to kickstart the React project, aligning it with Figma mockups, and collaborating with Paul, the designer, to ensure the design and features matched the vision

title: Oh My Food
description: 'OHMYFOOD' is an innovative project that revolutionizes the dining experience, allowing customers to pre-design their menus in gourmet restaurants, eliminating traditional wait times. I was tasked with creating a mobile-first website based on mockups provided by the UX designer, including detailed animations for a seamless user experience.
